faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Dixis is an online marketplace for buying and selling products.
faq.question2: How do I create an account?
faq.answer2: To create an account, simply click on the "Sign Up" button and follow the instructions.
faq.question3: How do I make a purchase?
faq.answer3: To make a purchase, browse the available products, add the ones you want to your cart, and then proceed to checkout.
